history_and_development.title: History and Development of the Store

content.text: Establishment Date: Established on September 9, 2023, we embarked on our journey with a passion for technology, aiming to bring the best products to our customers.

Key Development Steps: Throughout our development journey, we expanded our product line from smartphones to other smart electronic devices such as smartwatches and tablets. Our strategic partners and distribution network have expanded nationwide, ensuring convenience and reliability for our customers.

Mission and Vision: We are committed to delivering the most advanced technology, dedicated service, and the most exciting shopping experience for our customers. Our vision is to be at the forefront of providing innovative and efficient technology solutions.

Products and Services: At our store, you'll find a range of products from the most renowned brands in the market. From high-quality mobile phones to smart electronic devices and useful accessories, all our products are carefully selected to meet customers' needs.
Prominent Features: Designed with unique features, high performance, and the latest technology, our products offer an excellent user experience and utility for users.
Quality and Commitment: We are committed to product and service quality, as well as reputable warranty policies and dedicated customer support.
Partnerships and Brands: Our strategic partners are leading reputable brands, offering diversity and maximum quality for our customers.
Customer Support: We provide 24/7 support services via phone, email, and online chat, ready to address any customer queries.
Reviews and Feedback: Our reliability is evidenced by positive feedback from customers, which motivates us to continue improving and serving better.
Technology Updates: Our website always updates information on trends, new technologies, and important events in the tech industry.
Events and Promotions: We regularly organize events and promotional programs to show appreciation to customers and offer special deals.
Privacy Policy: We are committed to protecting customers' personal information according to publicly disclosed privacy policies.
Return and Warranty Policy: Providing detailed information on product return regulations, warranty, ensuring customer confidence while shopping.
Legal Information: Information related to copyrights, terms and conditions of website usage, ensuring transparency and credibility in business.

contact.name: Name
contact.description: Please fill in the following form and send it to us. We will reply you as soon as possible. Thank you!

privacyPolicy.heading: Privacy Policy
content: Welcome to EGU STORE. We are committed to protecting your personal information and using it responsibly to provide the best shopping experience.
Below are the key points of our Privacy Policy:

sections.title: 1. Customer information collection
points: To use our services, customers need to provide some necessary personal information.
This information helps us accurately determine delivery and payment.

sections.title: 2. Use of information
points: Your personal information is used to provide the best services, including sending newsletters, customer support, and improving service quality.
We use information to resolve arising issues and prevent legal violations.

sections.title: 3. Information sharing
points: Personal information is never shared unless requested by law enforcement or to protect the rights of both users and EGU STORE.
We only share information with customer consent or in specific cases notified in advance.

sections.title: 4. Customer information security
points: Customers also play a crucial role in protecting their personal information by maintaining password security and logging out of shared computers.
We commit not to disclose customer personal information for commercial purposes.

sections.title: Contact
content: If you have any questions or contributions related to our Privacy Policy, please contact us via the phone or email below:
Note: EGU STORE's customer information privacy policy is only applicable at http://www.EGUSTORE.com/. It does not include or relate to third parties advertising or linking at EGUSTORE.
